Articles.Content:
My game freezes...

My ship with 9 probe cores freezes every time recover or revert. I get stuck on the loading screen but the mini planets on the loading screens still move

Hello there. You haven’t included much information. Please read the article below and include the information it recommends, which will make it much easier for someone to help you. As a start, I’d like to know: your KSP version, what mods you have installed (you are posting in the modded installs section so I’m assuming you use them) and if possible upload the log files (KSP.txt from inside the KSP folder as well as Player.txt and/or output_log.txt which can be in different places on different operating systems, try searching for them) and post a link so I or others can read them. Log files contain a lot of information that can help pinpoint what’s causing a problem and suggest ways to fix them.
